description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              *General Information:
              
              - Work place: No.601-606 Room, Thanh Dat 1 Building, No. 3 Le Thanh Tong street, May To ward, Ngo Quyen district, Haiphong city.
              

              *Document controller tasks
              
              Document controlling tasks will work directly, on a day-today basis, with all documents relating to the project including:
              
              + Receive all incoming document and drawings
              
              + Keep record and update record of all incoming and outgoing documents and drawings; follow up to ensure the information is recorded properly in soft copies on computer and/or internet based tracking system. Keep drawings and document safely and systematically.
              
              + Draft cover letter in English and translate in Vietnamese; Attend and draft the Minutes of Meeting (Weekly & Monthly between PMU, ENG & Contractor)
              
              + Prepare transmittal/ Be in charge of all documents submitted to ENG & PMU timely
              
              + Make electronic files and circulate all incoming and outgoing documents to ensure that all documents being checked by section managers
              
              + Translation of technical documents.
              
              + All other duties that may be assigned from time to time by the management
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              + University graduate, major in English language
              
              + At least 1 years of experience in translation / document controlling work
              
              + Good command of computer, word and excel
